channel.title: Settings ids
channel.description:
In the client, there is an int array called variousSettings. These values are for those, changing the specified portion of specified value will change the object/entity visible to corrosponding value in the brackets. Entity: http://pastebin.com/E4CNRwJ9
Fixed: Object: http://pastebin.com/3ujDrczG By simply changing the setting (sending it to client) it will automatically update.

In the client, there is an int array called variousSettings. These values are for those, changing the specified portion of specified value will change the object/entity visible to corrosponding value in the brackets.
